![Body-Warming Powder .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Body-Warming_Powder_.jpg)| Body-Warming Powder | Uncommon | Upon use, instantly removes Chilled State and significantly reduces Chill Resistance for a short duration | • Craft from the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after helping Xu Dog defeat Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw in Sandgate Village - Village Entrance in Yellow WInd Ridge| • 1 Fire Bellflower"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a decorative container, likely representing the "Amplification Pellets" from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong." According to the context provided, these pellets are a rare item that, when used, moderately increases the player's critical hit chance for a long duration. They can be crafted at the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after completing a specific quest involving Xu Dog and Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw in Sandgate Village. The required ingredients for crafting include 1 Snake-Head Mushroom and 1 Aged Ginseng.
